snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Wednesday's selections include an inside look at the life of an Internet celebrity and new research on the Cupid-playing performance of online...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Wednesday's selections include an inside look at the life of an Internet celebrity and new research on the Cupid-playing performance of online dating sites.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: A Boldface Internet Name and the First GPS
